Text_origin: Para ele, cada leitura de qualquer texto sempre proporcionará um novo redimensionamento e entendimento desse texto. Metaforicamente falando, ele se posiciona diante dos textos como o banhista do rio de Heráclito, no qual é impossível entrar duas vezes devido a seu curso estar em constante mutação.
Text_en: For him, each reading of any text will always provide a new resizing and understanding of that text. Metaphorically speaking, he stands before the texts as the Heraclitus River Bather, which it is impossible to enter twice because its course is constantly changing.

Text_origin: For him, each reading of any text will always provide a new resizing and understanding of that text. Metaphorically speaking, he stands before the texts as the Heraclitus River Bather, which it is impossible to enter twice because its course is constantly changing.
Text_en: For him, each reading of any text will always provide a new resizing and understanding of that text. Metaphorically speaking, he stands before the texts as the Heraclitus River Bather, which it is impossible to enter twice because its course is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Kwa yeye, kila usomaji wa maandishi yoyote daima yatatoa majibu mpya na uelewa wa maandishi hayo. Akiongea kimafanikio, anasimama mbele ya maandiko kama Boti ya Mto Heraclitus, ambayo haiwezekani kuingia mara mbili kwa sababu kozi yake inabadilika kila wakati.
Text_en: For him, every reading of any text will always provide new answers and understanding of the text. Successfully speaking, he stands in front of labels like the Heraclitus River Boat, which is impossible to double-dip because his course is constantly changing.

Text_origin: بالنسبة له ، فإن كل قراءة لأي نص ستوفر دائمًا إجابات جديدة وفهمًا للنص. يتحدث بنجاح ، إنه يقف أمام علامات مثل Heraclitus River Boat ، وهو مستحيل التراجع المزدوج لأن مساره يتغير باستمرار.
Text_en: For him, every reading of any text will always provide new answers and an understanding of the text. Speaking successfully, he stands in front of signs like Heraclitus River Boat, and it is impossible to double retract because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Kwaari, kuverenga kwega kwega chero zvinyorwa kunogara kuchizopa mhinduro nyowani uye kunzwisisa kwechinyorwa. Achitaura akabudirira, iye anomira pamberi pezviratidzo zvakaita seHeraclitus river Boat, uye hazvigoneke kudzokorora kaviri nekuti nzira yake iri kuramba ichichinja.
Text_en: For him, every reading of any text will always provide fresh answers and insight into the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of icons like the Heraclitus river Boat, and it is impossible to duplicate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: A gare shi, kowane karatun kowane rubutu koyaushe yana ba da sababbin amsa da fa'ida cikin rubutun. Da yake magana game da nasara, yana tsaye a gaban gumaka kamar kogin Heraclitus, kuma ba shi yiwuwa a kwafa saboda hanyarsa tana canzawa koyaushe.
Text_en: For him, every reading of every text always gives new answers and benefits in the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of idols like the river Heraclitus, and it is impossible to copy because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Kwa yeye, kila usomaji wa maandishi kila wakati hutoa majibu mpya na faida katika maandishi. Akizungumzia mafanikio, yeye husimama mbele ya sanamu kama mto Heraclitus, na haiwezekani kuiga kwa sababu njia yake inabadilika kila wakati.
Text_en: For him, every text reading always provides new answers and benefits in the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of an image like the river Heraclitus, and it is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: For him, every text reading always provides new answers and benefits in the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of an image like the river Heraclitus, and it is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.
Text_en: For him, every text reading always provides new answers and benefits in the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of an image like the river Heraclitus, and it is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: بالنسبة له ، كل قراءة نصية توفر دائمًا إجابات وفوائد جديدة في النص. في معرض حديثه عن النجاح ، يقف أمام صورة مثل نهر هيراكليتس ، ومن المستحيل تقليده لأن طريقه يتغير باستمرار.
Text_en: For him, every text reading always provides new answers and benefits in the text. Speaking of success, he stands in front of a picture like the Heraclitus River, and it is impossible to imitate it because his way is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Ho azy, ny famakiana isaky ny andinin-teny dia manome valiny vaovao sy tombontsoa ao anaty lahatsoratra. Raha hiresaka fahombiazana dia mijoro eo anoloana sary sahala amin'ny reniranon'i Heraclitus, ary tsy azo atao ny maka tahaka an'io satria miova tsy tapaka ny lalany.
Text_en: For him, reading each passage provides new answers and benefits in the text. When it comes to success, it stands in front of a picture like the river Heraclitus, and it's impossible to replicate it because its path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Kwa yeye, kusoma kila kifungu kunatoa majibu mapya na faida katika maandishi. Linapokufaulu, linasimama mbele ya picha kama mto Heraclitus, na haiwezekani kuiga kwa sababu njia yake inabadilika kila wakati.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph provides new answers and benefits in the text. When it fails, it stands in front of an image like the river Heraclitus, and it is impossible to imitate because its path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Pour lui, la lecture de chaque paragraphe fournit de nouvelles réponses et de nouveaux avantages dans le texte. Quand il échoue, il se place devant une image comme la rivière Héraclite et il est impossible de l'imiter car son chemin change constamment.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph provides new answers and new benefits in the text. When he fails, he places himself before an image like the Heraclitus River and it is impossible to imitate him because his path changes constantly.

Text_origin: بالنسبة له ، توفر قراءة كل فقرة إجابات جديدة وفوائد جديدة في النص. عندما يفشل ، يضع نفسه أمام صورة مثل نهر هيراكليتس ويستحيل تقليده لأن طريقه يتغير باستمرار.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph provides new answers and new benefits in the text. When he fails, he puts himself in front of an image like the Heraclitus River and is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Pour lui, la lecture de chaque paragraphe fournit de nouvelles réponses et de nouveaux avantages dans le texte. Lorsqu'il échoue, il se place devant une image comme le fleuve Héraclite et il est impossible de l'imiter car son chemin change constamment.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph provides new answers and new benefits in the text. When he fails, he places himself before an image like the Heraclitus River and it is impossible to imitate him because his path changes constantly.

Text_origin: بالنسبة له ، توفر قراءة كل فقرة إجابات جديدة وفوائد جديدة في النص. عندما يفشل ، يضع نفسه أمام صورة مثل نهر هيراكليتس ويستحيل تقليده لأن طريقه يتغير باستمرار.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph provides new answers and new benefits in the text. When he fails, he puts himself in front of an image like the Heraclitus River and is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Pou li, li chak paragraf bay repons ak nouvo benefis nouvo nan tèks la. Lè li echwe, li mete tèt li nan devan yon foto tankou Heraclitus larivyè Lefrat ak se enposib imite paske chemen l 'yo toujou ap chanje.
Text_en: For her, reading each paragraph gives new answers and new benefits to the text. When he fails, he puts himself in front of a picture like Heraclitus River and is impossible to imitate because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: د هغې لپاره ، د هرې پاراګراف لوستل نوي متن ته نوي ځوابونه او نوې ګټې ورکوي. کله چې هغه ناکام شي ، نو هغه ځان د هرکلیټس سیند په څیر د عکس مخې ته نیسي او د نقشه کول یې ناممکن دي ځکه چې د هغه لاره په دوامداره توګه بدلیږي.
Text_en: For her, reading each paragraph gives new answers and new benefits to the new text. When he fails, he places himself in front of a mirror along the Hercules River and it is impossible to map as his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: Pour elle, la lecture de chaque paragraphe donne de nouvelles réponses et de nouveaux avantages au nouveau texte. Lorsqu'il échoue, il se place devant un miroir le long de la rivière Hercules et il est impossible de le cartographier car son chemin change constamment.
Text_en: For her, reading each paragraph gives new answers and new benefits to the new text. When he fails, he places himself in front of a mirror along the Hercules River and it is impossible to map because his path changes constantly.

Text_origin: Kwa iye, kuwerenga ndime iliyonse kumamupatsa mayankho atsopano komanso zabwino zatsopano. Akalephera, amadziyika patsogolo pagalasi pafupi ndi Mtsinje wa Hercules ndipo ndizosatheka kupanga mapu chifukwa njira yake imasintha nthawi zonse.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he fails, he puts himself in front of a mirror near the Hercules River and is impossible to map because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: بالنسبة له ، فإن قراءة كل فقرة يعطيه إجابات جديدة وإمكانيات جديدة. عندما يفشل ، يضع نفسه أمام مرآة بالقرب من نهر هيركوليس ويستحيل رسم خريطة لأن طريقه يتغير باستمرار.
Text_en: For him, reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he fails, he puts himself in front of a mirror near the Hercules River and impossible to map because his path is constantly changing.

Text_origin: ለእሱ እያንዳንዱን አንቀፅ ማንበብ አዳዲስ መልሶችን እና አዳዲስ አማራጮችን ይሰጠዋል ፡፡ ሲሳካለት በሄክኩለስ ወንዝ አጠገብ ባለው መስታወት ፊት ለፊት አቆመ እና መንገዱ ያለማቋረጥ እየተለወጠ ስለሆነ ካርታውን ለማሳየት የማይቻል ነው ፡፡
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of the glass near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing so it was impossible to show the map.

Text_origin: Reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of the glass near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing so it was impossible to show the map.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of the glass near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing so it was impossible to show the map.

Text_origin: La lecture de chaque paragraphe lui donne de nouvelles réponses et de nouvelles possibilités. Lorsqu'il a échoué, il s'est garé devant la vitre près de la rivière Hercules et la route changeant constamment, il était donc impossible d'afficher la carte.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of the window near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing, so it was impossible to display the map.

Text_origin: Kusoma kila aya kumpa majibu mapya na uwezekano mpya. Aliposhindwa, akapaki mbele ya dirisha karibu na Mto wa Hercules na barabara ilikuwa ikibadilika kila wakati, kwa hivyo haikuwezekana kuonyesha ramani.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives him new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of a window near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing, so it was impossible to show the map.

Text_origin: A leitura de cada parágrafo fornece novas respostas e novas possibilidades. Quando ele falhou, ele estacionou em frente a uma janela perto do rio Hércules e a estrada estava constantemente mudando, por isso era impossível mostrar o mapa.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new possibilities. When he failed, he parked in front of a window near the Hercules River and the road was constantly changing, so it was impossible to show the map.

Text_origin: Lekti chak paragraf bay nouvo repons ak nouvo opòtinite. Lè li te fè, li te kanpe devan yon fenèt tou pre Hercules larivyè Lefrat la ak chemen an te chanje pou li pa t 'kapab montre kat la.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stood in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so he couldn't show the map.

Text_origin: قراءة كل فقرة توفر إجابات جديدة وفرصًا جديدة. عندما فعل ذلك ، وقف أمام نافذة بالقرب من نهر هرقل وتم تغيير المسار حتى لا يتمكن من عرض الخريطة.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stood in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so he could not view the map.

Text_origin: La lecture de chaque paragraphe fournit de nouvelles réponses et de nouvelles opportunités. Quand il l'a fait, il s'est tenu devant une fenêtre près de la rivière Hercules et le chemin a été modifié pour qu'il ne puisse pas voir la carte.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stood in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so he could not see the map.

Text_origin: قراءة كل فقرة توفر إجابات جديدة وفرصًا جديدة. عندما فعل ذلك ، وقف أمام نافذة بالقرب من نهر هرقل وتم تغيير المسار حتى لا يتمكن من رؤية الخريطة.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stood in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so he could not see the map.

Text_origin: La lecture de chaque paragraphe fournit de nouvelles réponses et de nouvelles opportunités. Quand il l'a fait, il s'est tenu devant une fenêtre près de la rivière Hercules et le chemin a été modifié pour qu'il ne puisse pas voir la carte.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stood in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so he could not see the map.

Text_origin: Kusoma kila aya inatoa majibu mapya na fursa mpya. Alipofanya hivyo, alisimama mbele ya dirisha karibu na Mto wa Hercules na njia ilibadilishwa ili asione ramani.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph offers new answers and new opportunities. When he did, he stopped in front of a window near the Hercules River and the path was changed so that he could not see the map.

Text_origin: Ny famakiana fehintsoratra tsirairay dia manome valiny vaovao sy fotoana vaovao. Rehefa nanao izany izy dia nijanona teo anoloan'ny varavarankely teo akaikin'ny Reniranon'i Hercules ary niova ny lalana mba tsy ahitany ilay sarintany.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new times. As he did so, he stopped at a window near the Hercules River and changed direction so he couldn't see the map.

Text_origin: قراءة كل فقرة توفر إجابات جديدة وأوقات جديدة. كما فعل ذلك ، توقف عند نافذة بالقرب من نهر هيركوليس وغير اتجاهه حتى لا يتمكن من رؤية الخريطة.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new times. As he did, he stopped at a window near the Hercules River and changed direction so he could not see the map.

Text_origin: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new times. As he did, he stopped at a window near the Hercules River and changed direction so he could not see the map.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new times. As he did, he stopped at a window near the Hercules River and changed direction so he could not see the map.

Text_origin: Kusoma kila aya hutoa majibu mapya na nyakati mpya. Alipofanya hivyo, akasimama kwenye dirisha karibu na Mto wa Hercules na akabadilisha mwelekeo ili asiweze kuona ramani.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph provides new answers and new times. When he did, he stopped at a window near the Hercules River and changed direction so he couldn't see the map.

Text_origin: Karatun kowane sakin layi yana ba da sababbin amsoshi da sababbin lokuta. Da ya yi haka, sai ya tsaya a kan taga kusa da Kogin Hercules kuma ya canza alƙawarin don ya ga katun.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives new answers and new times. When he did so, he stood on a window near the Hercules River and changed his appointment to see the cards.

Text_origin: Kuverenga ndima yega yega kunopa mhinduro nyowani uye nguva nyowani. Paakadaro, akamira pahwindo pedyo neHercules River uye akachinja musangano wake kuti aone makadhi.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives you a better answer and a better time. When he did, he stood at a window near the Hercules River and turned his meeting to see the cards.

Text_origin: قراءة كل فقرة تمنحك إجابة أفضل ووقت أفضل. عندما فعل ذلك ، وقف عند نافذة بالقرب من نهر هرقل وتحول لقائه لرؤية البطاقات.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives you a better answer and a better time. When he did, he stood at a window near the Hercules River and turned to meet him to see the cards.

Text_origin: Kusoma kila aya hukupa jibu bora na wakati mzuri. Alipofanya hivyo, alisimama kwenye dirisha karibu na Mto wa Hercules na kugeuka kukutana naye ili kuona kadi.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives you the best answer and the best time. As he did so, he stood at a window near the Hercules River and turned to meet him to see the card.

Text_origin: Reading each paragraph gives you the best answer and the best time. As he did so, he stood at a window near the Hercules River and turned to meet him to see the card.
Text_en: Reading each paragraph gives you the best answer and the best time. As he did so, he stood at a window near the Hercules River and turned to meet him to see the card.
